name: Little Red
description: One of my favorite fairytales, Little Red Riding Hood has many underlying messages to it. The vibrant red cloak in this pendant really makes the piece POP. The pendant is made from a sterling silver 20mm bezel and bale. Shipping rate is for Canada and United States, please contact me for rates in other parts of the world.

name: Taken
description:
I give you my heart. This charm necklace comes with a red enamelled copper heart and a hand stamped sterling silver charm with two heart cutouts. Sterling silver chain is 16 inches in length.

	If you are interested in buying more than one item, please contact me about shipping before buying to see if we can work something out for <sup>_</sup>

	Shipping rate is for Canada and United States, please contact me for rates in other parts of the world.

name: Tranquil Seas
description:
Three strand chain with two enamelled copper pendants. Length of chain is 16”. Pendants have been torch fired with vitreous enamel.

	Shipping rate is for Canada and United States, please contact me for rates in other parts of the world.

name: Charmed
description:
This necklace has been hand forged, cut, soldered and stamped out of sterling silver and for an extra splash of colour a swarovski crystal has been added. The swarovski crystal is amethyst in colour.
This charm necklace is about forever. Forever in my heart, yours forever, remember forever, always and forever. If you would like a similar piece with your own name or special word feel free to message me, I am always happy to make custom orders. I recently did a custom piece for someone for mothers day which read “MOMMY”

	Shipping rate is for Canada and United States, please contact me for rates in other parts of the world.

name: Nesting
description:
This amazingly beautiful photo of birds eggs in a nest by photographer Mary R. Vogt, combined with a sterling silver 20mm bezel and bail make the perfect pendant. This is one of those pendants that grabs peoples attention. At craft fairs, this is one of my more popular pieces of jewellery.

	Shipping rate is for Canada and United States, please contact me for rates in other parts of the world.
Includes 16” sterling silver chain
